item.title: First Post
item.description: Testing Link to heading The good thing is that I’m still kinda new on writing in markdown. It’s good tho, that way I can organize my thoughts9 better. I think this is enough, let’s see how it looks on the web. Those 3 dashes are sick tho ahahahha I Like it. Some short codes: ðŸ˜— Note One note here. Tip I’m giving a tip about something.
